name: TypeScript LSP
description: TypeScript/JavaScript language server for Claude Code, providing code intelligence features like go-to-definition, find references, and error checking.
longDescription: Integrates `typescript-language-server` for TypeScript and JavaScript files (`.ts`, `.tsx`, `.js`, `.jsx`, `.mts`, `.cts`, `.mjs`, `.cjs`). Provides go-to-definition, find references, completions, and error checking. Install via `npm install -g typescript-language-server typescript`.
